title: Is this font Calibri Bold?
content:
The "G" looks a bit different.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019142152im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled1_4958.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019142152im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled2_5724.jpg)

Thanks in advance.
author: G-W

comments.content: No, not Calibri. Several of the letters are different (K, for example) and Calibri has very round terminals
Thanks. Do you know what font it is?
